pullRequest.title: Slayer plugin: add activate slayer gem functionality and fix existing…
pullRequest.bodyText:
… task for konar and wilderness tasks
I updated the regex for when you talk to a slayer master when already having a task to also work for Konar and Wilderness tasks and I also updated it to work for when you activate the slayer gem and I have added tests for these scenarios.
Issue:
closes #11863

commit.message: Slayer plugin: add activate slayer gem functionality and fix existing task for konar and wilderness tasks

Apply suggested changes to NPC_CURRENT_MESSAGE regex

Co-authored-by: Jordan <Nightfirecat@users.noreply.github.com>
